abort.already_configured: Tá an gléas cumraithe cheana féin

dhcp_confirm.description: Fuarthas teirmeastat Airobot {device_id} ag {host}. Cuir isteach an focal faire chun an socrú a chríochnú. Aimsigh an focal faire i roghchlár socruithe an teirmeastait faoi Nascacht → Aip shoghluaiste.

data_description.host: Ainm óstach nó seoladh IP do theirmeastat Airobot.

user.description: Cuir isteach sonraí nasc do theirmeastait Airobot. Aimsigh ID agus pasfhocal an Ghléis i roghchlár socruithe an theirmeastait faoi Nascacht → Aip shoghluaiste.

set_preset_mode_failed.message: Theip ar an modh réamhshocraithe a shocrú go {preset_mode}.

set_temperature_failed.message: Theip ar an teocht a shocrú go {temperature}.
